short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Google search experience by hiding distracting elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your Google search experience with Pure Search - your powerful tool for distraction-free browsing.

Pure Search puts you in control, allowing you to effortlessly filter out unnecessary elements from your search results. With intuitive toggles, easily hide Google News, Knowledge Panels, Top Stories, News Results, and Social Media content. Streamline your search process and focus on what truly matters.

Feeling overwhelmed? Activate "Hide All" with a single click and instantly declutter your results. For extended focus sessions, lock your preferred settings for 24 hours and enjoy consistent, clean searches.

Whether you're a student conducting research, a professional seeking specific information, or anyone looking to optimize their online searches, Pure Search is your go-to solution for a more efficient search experience.

Install Pure Search now and experience the difference that clarity can make in your daily browsing.

Pure Search: Find What Matters.
